text.p1:
Name: Monarchy


Position: Director
Team: Administration
Director Monarchy at your service!
Greetings FH I am almost 17 and I am Chinese!
I have have been FHS for a little bit over 5 months and I have been leading and building the news team for about 1 month.
Vision: My vision for the news team is to bring the FH community together and celebrating achievements made by custom sites and factions!

Name: Niuqao


Position: Assistant Director
Team: Administration & Writting Team
I'm a former FH Staff member, part of the current Senior FHS Aaron_Alessandro Batch.
I've wanted to lead the News Team since December 2024, and I'm glad I was given the opportunity.
Although I'm mostly unavailable, my DMs are open for any questions or concerns.
Vision: Ideally, the News Team would help the Custom Server community stay informed and do what other news broadcasting factions tried to do.
I believe with the support from the FH Administration, this matter can be made with ease.
We thank everyone for their support of our Pilot Version.

Name: Sel


Position: Team Leader
Team: Outreach
I'm Sel, current Factions Hub Staff, and so on.
I will always love vro.
Vision: I think it'll be a great team, as well as an active one.
I believe it'll also be the best team for FH's growth.

Name: Sur


Position: Team Lead
Teams: Website Team & Writing Team
Most of you probably know me already.
I lead both the Website and Writing teams, and I also manage the FH News website.
Vision: Balancing Form and Function, look good feel good and definitely work good.

Name: Aero


Position: Trial News Team
Team: Outreach Team
Hey there! I'm aero1flare, call me aero for short.
I'm just a chill guy living a complex life. I hope to being alot to the team.
I'm currently working as Outreach Team for FH: News and looks forward to making documentaries and stories for FH: News!

Name: pie


Position: News Team
Team: Outreach Team
I am pie/hottpie, currently positioned as standard Outreach Team and founder behind the semi-known resource and documentary server Locked In.
I wish to bring my collaboratory reach and SCP:RP knowledge in betterment of this team and the community in general.

Name: Jay


Position: Trial News Staff
Team: Outreach Team
About me: Hey! My name is Jay but you can call me JJ. I am currently working for the SCP FH News Team. I love to startup servers by setting them up, adding bots, and helping the owner create an inviting server based off their needs. I also make logos, graphics, and videos.
